definitions.definition: ( US , technical ) In textile inspections, a rough or coarse defect in the woven fabric.
( UK , Ireland , obsolete , colloquial ) The worst part or end of a thing .

main_definition: ( US , technical ) In textile inspections, a rough or coarse defect in the woven fabric.
secondary_definitions: ( UK , Ireland , obsolete , colloquial ) The worst part or end of a thing .

definitions.definition: ( UK , Ireland , colloquial , now rare ) A chore : an arduous and tiresome task .
( UK , Ireland , education , historical , colloquial ) A younger student acting as a servant for senior students .

main_definition: ( UK , Ireland , colloquial , now rare ) A chore : an arduous and tiresome task .
secondary_definitions: ( UK , Ireland , education , historical , colloquial ) A younger student acting as a servant for senior students .

definitions.definition: A homosexual man, especially ( usually derogatory ) an effeminate or unusual one.
definitions.label_groups: US , Canada , vulgar , usually offensive , sometimes endearing

examples: Why did you do that, you fag ?

main_definition: ( US , Canada , vulgar , usually offensive , sometimes endearing ) A homosexual man, especially ( usually derogatory ) an effeminate or unusual one.
secondary_definitions: ( US , vulgar , derogatory , offensive ) An annoying person.
